Name: Battle In The City
About the game: Battle in the city is a top-down shooter, where the player's goal is to defend his base, for that the player will have to find the best strategy to face the different enemies that will appear. The game consists of 35 levels, each map contains different types of obstacles and the difficulty increases gradually. Prove that you are capable and face this challenge!
